public abstract class AbstractIdFetcher
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
implements com.semanticbits.security.contentfilter.IdFetcher

A base class of all IdFetcher implementations, which provides the basic infrastructure level requirements.

Author:
Biju Joseph
